subject: p10402372
History: Bronchiectasis with pseudomonas colonization and persistent tachycardia.
Impression: AP chest compared to : Bronchial wall thickening or peribronchial infiltration in the lower lungs where most pronounced bronchiectasis is have worsened since consistent either with a flare of bronchiectasis or development of peribronchial pneumonia.
